name: COVENANT TRANSPORTATION GROUP, INC.
description: Covenant Transportation Group, Inc. is an established leader in the transportation and logistics industry, specializing in truckload services across North America. Founded in 1986, the company has grown to become one of the largest asset-based carriers in the United States, offering a diverse range of transportation solutions including dry van, temperature-controlled, and dedicated freight services. Covenant operates a fleet of over 2,000 trucks and provides comprehensive logistics services to a wide variety of industries, including automotive, retail, and food services. The company is committed to safety, efficiency, and sustainability, implementing advanced technologies to optimize its operations and reduce environmental impact. Covenant also emphasizes the importance of a strong corporate culture, fostering a supportive environment for its drivers and employees. With a focus on customer satisfaction, Covenant Transportation aims to deliver reliable, high-quality service while continuously innovating to meet the evolving needs of the transportation market.
